from collections import Counter
t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    str_len = int(input())
    str1 = input()
    str2 = input()
    counter1 = Counter(str1)
    counter2 = Counter(str2)
    if counter1 == counter2:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')
